SEARCH
Package smile.math.kernel

Class LinearKernel

java.lang.Object
smile.math.kernel.LinearKernel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, ToDoubleBiFunction<double[],double[]>, DotProductKernel, MercerKernel<double[]>, Function
public class LinearKernel extends Object implements MercerKernel<double[]>, DotProductKernel
The linear dot product kernel. When using a linear kernel, input space is identical to feature space.
See Also:
